Articles.Content: i saw this thing on the largest plane challenge, what mod allows those blades to rotate?

Probably Damned Aerospace or Damned Robotics - hard to see the part on the picture. I have a question about the picture too - does anyone know where those massive wings come from?!

EDIT: DA and DR both contain loads of fun, swivel-ly bits, you can find them in the plugin-powered addon section.

the original C7 flight pack

Yep thats all of them.
